mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOTEL(NO, NAME, CONTENT, PRICE, CITY, REG_DATE, TEL) VALUES(HOTEL_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{content}, #{price}, #{city}, sysdate, #{tel})
INSERT INTO HOTEL_IMG(NO, ORG_NAME, SAV_NAME, HOTEL_NO) VALUES(HOTEL_IMG_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{org_name}, #{sav_name}, #{hotel_no})
mapper.select: select * from hotel where no = (select max(no) from hotel)
